info.title: ConfidentialLedgerClient
info.description: The ConfidentialLedgerClient writes and retrieves ledger entries against the Confidential Ledger service.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: The Confidential Ledger URL, for example https://contoso.confidentialledger.azure.com

get.summary: Gets the constitution used for governance.
get.description: The constitution is a script that assesses and applies proposals from consortium members.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Consortium members can manage the Confidential Ledger.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets quotes for all nodes of the Confidential Ledger.
get.description: A quote is an SGX enclave measurement that can be used to verify the validity of a node and its enclave.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Retrieves a list of collection ids present in the Confidential Ledger
get.description: Collection ids are user-created collections of ledger entries

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Gets ledger entries from a collection corresponding to a range.
get.description: A collection id may optionally be specified. Only entries in the specified (or default) collection will be returned.

200.description: Ledger entries in the specified range.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

post.description: A collection id may optionally be specified.

200.description: Returns the transaction id at which the write will be durably stored.

x-ms-ccf-transaction-id.description: The transaction id at which this write will become durable.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Gets the ledger entry at the specified transaction id. A collection id may optionally be specified to indicate the collection from which to fetch the value.
get.description: To return older ledger entries, the relevant sections of the ledger must be read from disk and validated. To prevent blocking within the enclave, the response will indicate whether the entry is ready and part of the response, or if the loading is still ongoing.

200.description: The result of querying the Confidential Ledger.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets a receipt certifying ledger contents at a particular transaction id.

200.description: The receipt for the write occurring at the transaction id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Gets the status of an entry identified by a transaction id.

200.description: The status of the entry recorded at the specified transaction id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Gets the current value available in the ledger.
get.description: A collection id may optionally be specified.

200.description: The current ledger entry available on the receiving node. Non-primary nodes may return older values.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Gets details on a list of users.
get.description: All users' object IDs and single role per user will be returned.

200.description: Users in the paged specified range.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Gets details on a list of users.
get.description: All users' object IDs and multiple roles will be returned.

200.description: Users in the paged specified range.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

delete.summary: Deletes a user from the Confidential Ledger.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed
Error response describing why the operation failed

patch.summary: Adds a user or updates a user's fields.
patch.description: A JSON merge patch is applied for existing users

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

delete.summary: Deletes a user with multiple roles from the Confidential Ledger.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.summary: Gets a user with multiple roles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

patch.summary: Adds a user or updates a user's fields.
patch.description: A JSON merge patch is applied for existing users

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Returns the user defined endpoint in the ACL instance

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates the user defined endpoint in the ACL instance

201.description: The user defined endpoint is created.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Runtime options for user defined endpoints.

200.description: Runtime options for user defined endpoints.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.summary: Runtime options for user defined endpoints.

200.description: Runtime options for user defined endpoints.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: It gets the module for the user defined endpoint.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of user defined functions present in the Confidential Ledger
get.description: User defined functions stored in the Confidential Ledger

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

delete.summary: Deletes a user defined function from the Confidential Ledger.

204.description: The specified user defined function is deleted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Returns the user defined function in the Confidential Ledger

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates the user defined function in the Confidential Ledger

200.description: The user defined function is updated.

x-ms-ccf-transaction-id.description: The transaction id at which this write will become durable.

201.description: The user defined function is created.

x-ms-ccf-transaction-id.description: The transaction id at which this write will become durable.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Executes the user defined function in the Confidential Ledger

200.description: The user defined function is executed. The response contains either the result of the execution (in case the function execution was successful) or an error object (in case the function execution returned an error).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Gets role actions for user defined roles
get.description: user defined roles allow users to define and manage app specific AuthZ policy.

200.description: Gets role actions for user defined roles

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Creates new roles and their actions
put.description: User defined roles allow users to define and manage app specific AuthZ policy.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.summary: Patch replaces the allowed action on existing roles,if the desire is to remove an existing action, the role must be deleted and recreated.
patch.description: User defined roles allow users to define and manage app specific AuthZ policy.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: A user defined role allows the users to create and manage their own role actions using the API.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ApplicationClaim.description: A claim of a ledger application.

ApplicationClaimKind.description: Represents the kind of an application claim.

ApplicationClaimProtocol.description: Represents the protocol to be used to compute the digest of a claim from the given claim data.

ClaimDigest.description: An application claim in digested form.

value.description: The digest of the application claim, in hexadecimal form.

LedgerEntryClaim.description: An application claim derived from ledger entry data.

ConfidentialLedgerEnclaves.description: Information about the enclaves running the Confidential Ledger.

currentNodeId.description: Id of the Confidential Ledger node responding to the request.

Consortium.description: List of members in the consortium.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

ConsortiumMember.description: Describes a member of the consortium.

certificate.description: PEM-encoded certificate associated with the member.

Constitution.description: The governance script for the application.

digest.description: SHA256 digest of the constitution script.

mrenclave.description: MRENCLAVE value of the code running in the enclave.

raw.description: Raw SGX quote, parsable by tools like Open Enclave's oeverify.

EnclaveQuotes.description: Dictionary of enclave quotes, indexed by node id.

preHooks.description: List of user defined function hooks to be executed before the ledger entry is written.

postHooks.description: List of user defined function hooks to be executed after the ledger entry is written.

LedgerQueryResult.description: The result of querying for a ledger entry from an older transaction id. The ledger entry is available in the response only if the returned state is Ready.

entry.description: The ledger entry found as a result of the query. This is only available if the query is in Ready state.

LedgerUser.description: Details about a Confidential Ledger user.

LedgerUserMultipleRoles.description: Details about a Confidential Ledger user.

MultipleRolesList.description: Represents list of roles for single user

LedgerWriteResult.description: Returned as a result of a write to the Confidential Ledger, the transaction id in the response indicates when the write will become durable.

MerkleProof.description: The Merkle proof verifying a transaction.

MerkleProofElement.description: An item in the Merkle proof.

PagedLedgerEntries.description: Paginated ledger entries returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

RoleAssignment.description: Object for assigning a role to a user.

PagedCollections.description: Paginated collections returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

PagedUserDefinedFunctions.description: Paginated user defined functions returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

PagedUsers.description: Paginated users returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

PagedLedgerUsers.description: Paginated users returned in response to a query.

nextLink.description: Path from which to retrieve the next page of results.

TransactionId.description: A unique identifier for the state of the ledger. If returned as part of a LedgerEntry, it indicates the state from which the entry was read.

TransactionReceipt.description: A receipt certifying the transaction at the specified id.

TransactionState.description: Represents the state of the transaction.

TransactionStatus.description: Response returned to a query for the transaction status

UserId.description: Identifier for the user. This must either be an AAD object id or a certificate fingerprint.

Bundle.description: bundle for the user defined endpoints

path.description: A map of path to method endpoints for the path

JSRuntimeOptions.description: JS runtime options for user defined endpoints and functions

roleName.description: name of the user defined role

roleActions.description: action of the user defined role

UserDefinedFunction.description: A user defined function in the ledger.

code.description: Code of the user defined function in JavaScript.

id.description: ID of the user defined function.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionProperties.description: The properties for executing a user defined function.

arguments.description: Runtime arguments of the user defined function. Defaults to an empty list.

exportedFunctionName.description: Name of the exported function to execute in the code of the user defined function. Defaults to main.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionStatus.description: Represents the status of a user defined function execution.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionError.description: The error object of a user defined function execution. This is returned only when the user defined function execution throws an exception.

message.description: Message indicating the error thrown when executing the function.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionResult.description: The result object of a user defined function execution. This is returned only when the user defined function executes successfully.

returnValue.description: String-encoded value returned by the user defined function execution. If the function does not return any value, this is set to an empty string.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionResponse.description: The result of a user defined function execution.

UserDefinedFunctionHook.description: Hook for a user defined function execution.

functionId.description: ID of the user defined function to execute.

UserDefinedFunctionHooks.description: List of user defined function hooks.

CommitParameter.name: commit
CommitParameter.description: The commit in the consensus protocol.

TransactionIdFromParameter.name: fromTransactionId
TransactionIdFromParameter.description: Specify the first transaction ID in a range.

TransactionIdToParameter.name: toTransactionId
TransactionIdToParameter.description: Specify the last transaction ID in a range.

UserDefinedFunctionParameter.name: userDefinedFunction
UserDefinedFunctionParameter.description: Specify a user defined function of a Confidential Ledger.

UserDefinedFunctionExecutionParameter.name: userDefinedFunctionExecutionProperties
UserDefinedFunctionExecutionParameter.description: Specify user defined function execution properties.

UserDetailsParameter.name: userDetails
UserDetailsParameter.description: Details about a Confidential Ledger user.

UserMultipleRolesParameter.name: userMultipleRoles
UserMultipleRolesParameter.description: Details about a Confidential Ledger user with multiple roles.

UserIdParameter.name: userId
UserIdParameter.description: The user id, either an AAD object ID or certificate fingerprint.

ModuleNameParameter.name: module
ModuleNameParameter.description: module name of the user defined endpoint
